Author: gcharang#6833
Content:
@Redman you could use your Verus Agama seed phrase in AtomicDEX through the "Restore" option
just select "Custom seed", make sure your address matches before funding it

Author: coingirl87#6489
Content: @ca333  where is the benefit for kmd when anyone could provide a browser basedatomic dex?

Author: smk762 -  dracocanis ominator#7640
Content: dexfees, and the discount for KMD pairs

Author: ca333#0118
Content: Many benefits like more tech adoption, more dexfees as mentioned by SMK, bigger unified liquidity-pool, much bigger userbase, chance for atomicDEX becoming the DEX standard protocol, and so on. It is also in the sense of the general open-source idea and our interoperability and unity vision.

Author: Markus#5464
Content: i see a line of text writing "getting prices from coingecko" are those prices up to date or is there a delay when they update prices?

Author: smk762 -  dracocanis ominator#7640
Content: each time some functions run, it gets prices from Binance or Coingecko API. I've heard CoinPaprika is also good, but havent integrated it

Author: Markus#5464
Content: Alright üòÑ

Author: smk762 -  dracocanis ominator#7640
Content: API prices (and availablity for coins) varies

Author: Markus#5464
Content: does the bot market buy or put a limit order?

Author: smk762 -  dracocanis ominator#7640
Content: I've not yet streamlined binance side of things much. Basically not worried about fiat, just use it to maintain a baseline balance of each coin. If I have too much of one and not enough of another, I'll adjust manually. Will automate this more later, but have been careful/paranoid with delegating too much power to API keys early on.

Content: I see üòõ

Author: hastrup#8742
Content: Where can I see all the orders in mm2?

Author: Oszy#5734
Content: you have to define a pair

Author: Oszy#5734
Content: like `"method\":\"orderbook\",\"base\":\"KMD\",\"rel\":\"HUSH\"}"`

Author: Oszy#5734
Content: do this for each pair you want to see and put ` > coinName.json` at the end

Author: Oszy#5734
Content: at least it's what i am doing

Author: Oszy#5734
Content: too lazy to make a web gui for it now

Author: Oszy#5734
Content: but you can only see orderbooks for coins that are activated at your mm2

Author: smk762 -  dracocanis ominator#7640
Content:
@hastrup If you time it right, orderbooks can be seen at https://oracle.earth/mm2_orderbook/
To my shame though, server is having some issues until I have time/fiat to upgrade and or move some things around, so it has been failing every now and then, but I can revive it once I am aware.

Author: hastrup#8742
Content: @Oszy @smk762 -  dracocanis ominator thx to both of you üôÇ
